>
[Pied Piping](/Feats.aspx?ID=1662) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 115 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You learn the [_pied piping_](/Spells.aspx?ID=730) composition spell, which enables you to control the actions of weak-minded individuals.
name: Pied Piping
